sub_title: Helps organizations and people thrive in the future of work. Talent management & Workplace wellbeing expert.
summary:
I’m an expert in the field of sustainable careers, performance and the well-being of human capital in organizations. In a rapidly changing (digital) world, we should help individuals excel in the current work context, without compromising their productivity, employability and vitality in the long term. I'm convinced that a committed, motivated and fit - both mentally and physically - workforce determines future success.
For me, that solution lies in a fundamentally different approach and a paradigm shift in the relationship between employee and employer. They need to enter into a more equal and mutual working relationship. Only if they regularly discuss that working relationship, career success and career ownership, can there be a win-win situation for both parties.
With my company Zest for Work I want to enable growth, inspire action and mobilize positive change on these themes, for individuals, teams and organizations. Because work is simply more impactful and fun when you are at your best.
--- Next to leading my own organization, I’m a strong professional that has the unique combination of being a sensitive and people-oriented person with an analytical technical industrial background - and corporate leadership experience. With 10 years’ experience in the corporate world in various roles, ranging from Corporate HR, Occupational Health and Wellbeing to Supply Chain, I bring a broad understanding of the business, together with extensive experience on the topics of sustainable employability, human performance and wellbeing. I’m an ICF certified Coach and hold a Master's degree in Science, and post grad in holistic nutrition.

Besides my passion for what drives and motivates people, I’m passionate about outdoor sports and mountaineering - which is quite a challenge being born in the flattest country on earth.

Want to how you or your organisation can start thriving instead of surviving? Connect via;

✆ 0031613949293 
✉ yvon@zestforwork.com
Fluent in Dutch, English and German

Keywords; Employability, Future of Work, Human transformation, Loopbaan Coaching, Burnout preventie, Stressmanagement, Duurzame inzetbaarheid, Vitaliteit, Veerkracht, training, High potentials, ICF, Careercoaching, Sustainable performance, Corporate wellness, Corporate Athlete, HPI, Corporate training, Occupational health and wellbeing programs. Psychological Capital, Positive Psychology, New career paradigm

profile_positions.description:
	Expert in talent management, sustainable performance and corporate wellbeing strategies in a digital and automated work environment. How do you build a culture of continuous learning, adaptation & wellbeing in your organization, where we let people thrive and excell in high stress environments, without them sacraficing their health and happiness.
	Corporate Athlete Trainer, trained at the JNJs Human Performance Institute (founded by Jim Loehr and Jack Groppel (Certified for 1 and 2 day training programs, keynotes & sustainment modules). Training provides employees insight in their own Energy expenditure (physical, emotional, mental and spiritual) and provides insights on how to increase their energy capacity/balance, to facilitate sustainable behavior change improving overall performance, health and happiness. Trained over 100 programs, 2500 individuals (from C-suite to production) in over 15 countries and 3 languages.
	ICF Certified Coach for 1-1 coach and team coaching (certified in the CarreerCoach van Thalento), specialized in career, energy and stress management, burnout prevention, SIMA, TA, core qualities, leadership development (>400 hours of coaching experience).
	Keynote speaker and available for workshops on topics like resiliance, personal energy management, psychological capital, the new careerpath paradigm, 21st century skills and others
profile_positions.title: Business Owner, International trainer, ICF Certified Coach

profile_positions.description:
Talentlogiqs ® aims to be a platform where …
• contemporary career frameworks and scientific knowledge are exchanged and translated into practical career management solutions and tools
• organizations pushing the boundaries of employability, mobility and well-being find solutions the mainstream does not offer
• career management experts find inspiration and first-in-kind scientifically validated tools. Furthermore they can exchange best-practices and experiences with likeminded professionals and get noticed by potential customers.

https://www.talentlogiqs.com
profile_positions.title: Talentlogiqs Network Partner, the Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Yvon is a CareerCoach within the A-lissome coaching network where she works with individuals in Flanders that have energy and careerrelated questions. She is therefore able to work with VDAB loopbaancheques that allows individuals that are inhabitants of Flanders to request 8 hr of careercoaching for just €80. Inhabitants of the EU that work in Flanders can also request this form of coaching.  

https://www.a-lissome.be/yvon-golbach
profile_positions.title: Career Coach at A-lissome

profile_positions.description:
	Responsible for the management of the Energy for Performance program enrollment in Europe, Middle East and Africa, (JNJ EMEA population >40.000 employees in 45 countries and 8 languages). 
	Part of the Corporate HR, Occupational Health and Wellness Promotion (OH-WP) Leadership team EMEA. Single Point of contact for the local stakeholders and the EMEA (OH-WP) resources regarding training enrollment.
	Hit the 2015 corporate goals to expose 50% of the JNJ population in EMEA either through training or keynotes 
	Enrolled > 600 courses Energy management training to over 10.000 additional employees in 2016 & 2017 in 7 different European languages. 
	Launched the program in the German speaking countries (Germany, Switzerland and Austria) in 2016 and in the Russian language in 2017 (management of bringing onboard new trainers, train, coach and certify them, set up new training locations).
profile_positions.title: Energy for Performance lead EMEA (Corporate HR, Occ Health and Wellness)

profile_positions.description:
     Trained >100 courses and touched >2500 individuals 
	Experienced in training executive leadership and board groups, professionals and blue-collar workers. 
     Delivered programs in over 15 different countries in Dutch, German and English.
	Certified in both the psychology and the fysiology modules

The JNJ launched a global initiative which is a 1 or 2 day experiential programme called ‘Energy  4 Performance’ that enables employees to take their current energy, performance, and achievement to the next level - personally and professionally. Externally the program is know as the Corporate Athlete program, founded at the Human Performance Institute of Jim Loehr which is also part of the Johnson and Johnson family of companies. nThe program supports people to manage their most critical resource, their energy, more effectively at work and at home, overall become happier and better version of themselves while also increasing their performance. 

The ultimate goal for those attending training was to become more; Physically energized, Emotionally connected, Mentally focused & Spiritually aligned.

The programme includes:
- A 360° full engagement assessment (with family as well as business colleague feedback)
- Fitness and nutrition awareness
- Skill building experience and planning
- Exploring one’s values and purpose
- The creation of a personal strategic action plan
- Full blood work review focusing on lipids, chronic burnout markers, liver and kidney stress and cellular fatigue and function. 
- Body composition involving biological age, visceral ad body fat percentages, muscle mass and BMR
- Interval and resistance sessions
profile_positions.title: Internal Energy for Performance Trainer, (HPI - Corporate Athlete)
